abstract: Many aging veterans who were ousted from military for homosexuality are now applying to have their discharges reclassified as honorable; 2013 bill known as Restore Honor to Service Members Act, which would upgrade nearly all such discharges, is stalled in Congress and backers do not expect it to progress in near future.
lead_paragraph: Emboldened by recent advances for homosexuals in and out of the military, more gay veterans look to have their ousters reclassified.

headline.main: Ousted as Gay, Aging Veterans Are Battling Again for Honorable Discharges
headline.print_headline: Ousted as Gay, Aging Veterans Battling Again

snippet: Emboldened by recent advances for homosexuals in and out of the military, more gay veterans look to have their ousters reclassified.
